short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helping you stay mindful by asking if you're sure before visiting distracting sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take Control of Your Browsing Habits

Do you find yourself getting distracted by social media, streaming platforms, or online shopping when you should be focusing on more important tasks? WebVault is here to help! This extension encourages mindful browsing by gently prompting you to reconsider before visiting distracting websites. It’s not about blocking—it’s about helping you stay in control and productive.
